configuration/webapps causing it to hang, THEN reopen this issue.  Thanks.

text:
If "the system has benn up and working fine for an year until one day ..
this is a screenshot of the problemm:" - then an environment change is causing
this error.

Before reopening the bug - please use the tomcat-user list to help you debug
this issue. (Mentioning your environment change too) If there is a bug in tomcat
- feel free to reopen this report.
creator: funkman@joedog.org
